about_the_game:
Features

  • Hours of gathering and exploration in a dystopian horror-scape

  • A unique blend of fps action and survival horror in an endless expanse of brutalist architecture

  • An oppressive atmosphere of isolation in a treacherous ever-changing environment

  • Diverse creatures able to stalk, hunt, and devour the unprepared player

  • A story hidden between the cracks of concrete revealing humanity’s downfall

HARVEST

Scavenge broken machines and twisted horrors for resources rusty and alien. Choose what to scrap and what to collect, praying you find extraction chambers to save your precious loot. Will you take the gambles and boons of the maze, or embrace a slow risk-free grind?

UPGRADE

Return to the nest to upgrade and evolve your weaponry. Fuse artifacts with your tools to unlock new attributes and powers. Grow or perish. But what are you willing to sacrifice for your survival? Take care human, lest you become something else…

DISCOVER

Navigate this maze of horror, discover new environments hidden in the depths, and hunt greater monstrosities… or become the hunted. Watch your step. This place wasn’t built for humans

content_descriptors.notes: Monster design may sometimes include exposed body parts and/or body horror

name: Make Us Whole

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or better
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Discover the Labyrinth, an endless expanse of cold concrete, twisted monsters, chaotic anomalies, and powerful artifacts. Harvest resources from this brutalist jungle, inspired by the “BLAME!” manga, to upgrade your weaponry. Will you unveil the horrors that lie at its core, or die trying?
